metadata.name: Checks - Curio Cards
metadata.description:
Paying homage to what is essentially the first ever Open Edition, and the first art on Ethereum, the Curio Card Apple.

Curio Cards were the first time creator royalties were implemented on the Ethereum blockchain, and the first use of IPFS for image storage.

The collection consists of 30 (+1 misprint) cards varying in circulating supply. Here is a link the the genesis Apples: 

https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0x73da73ef3a6982109c4d5bdb0db9dd3e3783f313/1

Who knows what these will turn into?
